feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Rescheduling email when there is broken calendar integration by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15669
  • fix: disable google-meet in user onboarding if google-calendar is not installed by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15702
  • fix: set conferencing apps as default by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15376
  • chore: add i18n to atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15698
  • feat: add POST end point to mark calls as no-shows by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15690
  • revert: "fix: Autodetection of time zone only updated default time zone" by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15720
  • chore: cache org guard and fix roles guard apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15719
  • chore: sort calendar crendentials in event manager by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15448
  • fix: Text in Embed Code Visibility Fixed by @anku909 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15711
  • fix: api-v2 controllers e2e tests by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15724
  • fix: remove console.log and tsignore apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15732
  • fix: event type back button by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15722
  • fix: api v2 unit tests by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15733
  • chore: v4.2.5 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15735

New Contributors

  • @anku909 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15711

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.4...v4.2.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Campsite conferencing app by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15713
  • feat: BookerEmbed atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15689
  • chore: [app-router-migration] - add missing getServerSideProps to /event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15731
  • fix: Ensure unique username in an organization by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15730
  • chore: add check for booking by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15740
  • fix: icon visibility and add up and down icons by @Sahillather002 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15543
  • chore: readme platform libraries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15737
  • chore: fix apiv2 org teams doc by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15746
  • chore: Update README.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15766
  • chore: Release v4.3.0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15771

New Contributors

  • @nholden made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15713
  • @Sahillather002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15543

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.5...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: platform libraries versions cleanup api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15768
  • fix: higher resolution Campsite icon by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15777
  • refactor: allow system admins to create event-type without membership by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15774
  • chore: add platform-libraries change log by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15786
  • fix: filter admin_api if org is present by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15386
  • fix: #15749 Display availability page as per weekstart setting by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15753
  • chore: specify platform-libraries version for event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15785
  • feat: allow passing initial data props to calendar connectors by @satya-nutella in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15760
  • chore: Update /ee README.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15765
  • fix: Enable embed namespacing again by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15783
  • feat: Fix Proton Calendar with ICS by @sekaiking in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15454
  • fix: creating organization team should add owner by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15779
  • feat: API org user scope by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15739
  • docs(contributing): change fork link by @Just-Moh-it in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15792
  • fix: remove permission blocking public apiv2 event-types endpoint by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15801
  • chore: removed cal.ai email assistant by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15793
  • fix: booker readded border by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15798
  • fix: fetch workflows on the backend by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15796
  • fix: Add signout button on onboarding screen by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15807
  • fix: findOrgUser use profiles instead of organizationId apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15808
  • chore: set managed user locale via api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15794
  • feat: V2 Org Memberships by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15578
  • chore: Introduce a new class WebAppURL that extends URL by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14982
  • fix: Check URL by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15815
  • feat: Salesforce - Disable creating new contacts by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15780
  • chore: v4.3.1 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15817

New Contributors

  • @satya-nutella made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15760
  • @sekaiking made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15454
  • @Just-Moh-it made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15792
  • @NitinPSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15807

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.0...v4.3.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert: "chore: removed cal.ai email assistant (#15793)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15823
  • feat: [CAL-3939] fix org banner by @panzacoder in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15557
  • chore: update translation by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15818
  • fix: PATCH /me formatted timezone incorrectly by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15830
  • fix: revert libraries version event-types controller apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15831
  • fix: system default theme for dashboard and booking page by @DeepaPrasanna in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15291
  • feat: api v2 org team memberships endpoints by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15820
  • fix(website): fix sitemap by adding prisma env var by @p6l-richard in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15827
  • fix: multiple getSchedule requests on email change in booker by @dilpreetsio in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15616
  • fix: api-auth-strategy tests are e2e apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15837
  • feat: v2 organizations event types endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15775
  • fix: TimeZone select should show the selected timezone by @suprabhu77 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15838
  • feat: Add a fresh signup to matching organization after email verification by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15705
  • fix: added translations for et by @karlromets in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15762
  • fix: broken ui of availability setup in onboarding by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15854
  • fix: added fix for email title for issue# 15848 by @punitive1729 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15855
  • fix: Text in React Embed Code Becomes Invisible on Selection by @krishnendusukumar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15835
  • chore: Add transition effects in UI components by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15841
  • fix: Fix React cal api namespaced usage by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15834
  • feat: v2 API enable updating event type schedule by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15803
  • feat: api endpoints for calendar settings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15761
  • feat: skype app added by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14751
  • test: Create 4 test cases to POST Attendees by @viniciusvieira00 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15856
  • chore: add cleanup to api auth strategy e2e test apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15875
  • chore: updated bug_report.md template by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15876
  • refactor: auto-accept membership for v2 org team creator by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15866
  • feat: Link to rescheduled booking from the old one by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15211
  • chore: updated feature_request.md template by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15877
  • chore: v4.3.2 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15879

New Contributors

  • @panzacoder made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15557
  • @DeepaPrasanna made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15291
  • @karlromets made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15762
  • @punitive1729 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15855
  • @krishnendusukumar made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15835

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.1...v4.3.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Update component order, props for Link in user-public-view by @Spiteless in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15882
  • refactor: v2 organizations event-types e2e tests by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15886
  • chore: Add v2 API test suite by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15865
  • chore: Remove unit tests from running after crowd in by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15880
  • test: test cases for POST selected-calendars by @Lucas13032003 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15873
  • fix: Schedules_2024_04_15 cannot read properties of undefined by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15885
  • fix: Change conferencing app-store URL on event types and bookings pages by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15878
  • fix: edit button in availability page does not work on small screen #15888 by @saketsingh0078 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15890
  • chore: platform api usage based billing using queue by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15085
  • chore: Update bug_report.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15894
  • fix: google calendar event not deleted on updating the default calendar for a cal.com event by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14994
  • chore: fixed bug_report.yml by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15901
  • fix: Unable to invite a user to a team via username by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15868
  • feat: team owner/admin, be able to confirm/reject "requires confirmation" team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15326
  • chore: Update config.yml by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15900
  • chore: update dtos for v2 calendars endpoint by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15904
  • feat: org members can fetch their teams apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15910
  • feat: refactor drawer component by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15892
  • feat: usage base billed - license key check - move to private api by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15222
  • fix: make max_participants optional by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15920
  • chore: Release v4.3.3 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15924

New Contributors

  • @Spiteless made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15882
  • @Lucas13032003 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15873
  • @Souptik2001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15878
  • @saketsingh0078 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15890

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.2...v4.3.3
